page.title: 13Lower Tulleyswells Farm
page.content: We went to Lower Tulleyswells Farm. The Thomas family live there.Mrs Thomas never gets lonely in the country,but she likes to be near a town.She does her weekly shopping at Liptons and Bishops in Lewes.She has lived on a farm all her married life because she married a farmer.She often goes to Uckfield and says that she would find it hard to have a neighbour because of the noise coming from next door and because she would have to keep telling other people to be quiet.She is a governor of Hamsey Primary School at Cooksbridge. The house was built in 1786.It has 11 rooms and a separate flat for her Aunt.On the roof there are 3 different types of tiles because the roof has been changed many times.There was also some French flint.She does Bed and Breakfast and has a caravan site.
